title: Calories in Tostada Chips
meta_description: Learn calories in tostada chips per 100 g, including carbs, fat, protein, sodium details, and preparation tweaks for better tracking.
assumptions: Plain corn-based tostada chips, fried, no added salt, toppings, or dips; similar to standard tortilla chips.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, frying method, corn type, and portion size. Check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: 100 g of tostada chips provides ~502 kcal, mostly from carbs and fat.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in tostada chips per serving?
faqs.a: About 140 kcal in a typical 28 g (1 oz) serving.

faqs.q: Are tostada chips high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, ~25 g fat per 100 g, mostly from frying oil.

faqs.q: What's the carb content in tostada chips?
faqs.a: Around 52.8 g carbs per 100 g, with 4.9 g fiber.
Modest amount: ~7 g protein per 100 g.

faqs.q: How does sodium in tostada chips compare?
faqs.a: 569 mg per 100 g; opt for unsalted to reduce it.
